pullrequest.title: Adding xacro parameter to specify task name in plugin

content.raw:
I was testing with…

```
WORLD=phase2_dock0.world   
OR
WORLD=phase2_scan_and_dock0.world

roslaunch vrx_gazebo vrx.launch verbose:=true paused:=false wamv_locked:=true world:=${HOME}/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/worlds/${WORLD}
```

As for the documentation - I do believe we probably meant for the name in the Task Msg to be `dock`, but at least for phase 2, we decided to stick with what was written in the documentation.  See the last section here: [#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/events/19/phase2\_retrospective](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/events/19/phase2_retrospective)

We could change the interface and the documentation.  Trying to do the lease confusing thing.

‌
